programme.title: Portrait Of Home - EP 22
programme.desc: The Fishball factory Tong Xin Yuan is a successful local business, with thriving sales in both Singapore and overseas. But behind the company lies a dark mystery. The founder of Tong Xin Yuan, Zhou Dong (Chen Shucheng), married a beautiful factory worker Li Tian (Louise Li) many years ago. They had three sons - Dadi (Adrian Pang), Dashan (San Yow) and Daqiu (Cavin Soh). Zhou Dong disappeared after a kidnap attempt went awry; not even his body was found.

programme.title: Le Pays Des Sourds
programme.desc: Jean-Claude, Abou, Claire, Florent and the others are profoundly deaf. They all dream, think and communicate through signs. What is their world like? Nicolas Philibert takes us deep into the land of silence, where sight and touch are so important.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents - EP 3
programme.desc: Seeing that Francois and Jean-Pierre are having trouble communicating, Rollande decides to take things in hand and tries to get them to talk openly with one another.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents - EP 4
programme.desc: Jean-Pierre and Rollande head off on a cruise after having taken on a security guard to look after their house. On their return, Francois has to suffer the torment of looking at all the holiday photos his parents had taken.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents - EP 5
programme.desc: After learning that Rollande wants to write a book and Jean-Pierre dreams of inventing some revolutionary new product, Francois has to face the fact that his parents still aren't happy about leaving him on his own in the house despite his being 47 years old.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents - EP 6
programme.desc: To make up for the children leaving, Jean-Pierre and Rollande decide to adopt a budgerigar and have the greatest difficulty in agreeing on a name for their new pet.

programme.title: Femmes De L'art - EP 7
programme.desc: In the 18th century few women were able to join the Royal Academy of Painting and Sculpture, and work for Europe's most important royalty. With her character of tempered steel and her talent, she became her Marie-Antoinette's official portrait painter.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf

programme.title: Thiaroye 44
programme.desc: What happened on 1 December 1944 at the Thiaroye military camp in Senegal? West African soldiers, only just repatriated from the front, came under fire from French machine guns. Nearly 80 years later, three young artists from this Dakar suburb want to understand the reasons behind the massacre.

programme.title: La Bataille Pour La Foret - EP 4
programme.desc: Rather than travelling to the forests of the far north to get close to nature... we'd be better off caring for our urban woodlands. Unfortunately climate change is putting our city trees increasingly at risk.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut - EP 3
programme.desc: To celebrate the programme's 25th anniversary, an exceptional journey to Reunion Island. This volcanic island is one of the highest mountains in the world if measured from the ocean bed at a depth of 4,000 metres. It is also the highest French mountain massif, after the Alps and the Pyrenees.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Le Grand Move - EP 4
programme.desc: Yvan and Louis-Philippe have left their home in Montreal and moved into their very first house, in Rimouski, in the Lower Saint-Lawrence.

programme.title: Alex Beaupain, Je N'aime Que Toi
programme.desc: It's the story of a French singer-songwriter, joyful yet troubled. Beneath the tender and amused gaze of his cellist, Alex Beaupain reveals his inner self. The background to his creations, his finest partnerships, his friends, the stage, losing his first love... Portrait of an artist driven by childhood dream

programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Le Grand Move - EP 4
programme.desc: Yvan and Louis-Philippe have left their home in Montreal and moved into their very first house, in Rimouski, in the Lower Saint-Lawrence.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut - EP 3
programme.desc: To celebrate the programme's 25th anniversary, an exceptional journey to Reunion Island. This volcanic island is one of the highest mountains in the world if measured from the ocean bed at a depth of 4,000 metres. It is also the highest French mountain massif, after the Alps and the Pyrenees.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 30
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 31
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 17
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Toc Toc ! - EP 32
programme.desc: Whenever an animal is stressed or bothered about something, they head straight to see Claude the bull. Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claude's help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: Les Mutants - EP 31
programme.desc: Tom and Leo want to know if their mother is really alive. Unfortunately, the only person who can help them is Guy. But he's been arrested by the police thanks to Zoubi and Lucie.

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Curieux Begin - EP 1
programme.desc: In the company of Guylaine Guay and singer Mike Clay, we take a walk along Rue Wellington in Verdun, the ''coolest'' street in the world. What better opportunity to up-date your little black book with some must-visit addresses.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Point - EP 10
programme.desc: Through its reporters spread across the whole of Canada and the four corners of the world, the magazine ''Le Point'' gives a true testimony of what is happening in the major areas of Canada, Europe, Asia, Africa, the USA and Latin America.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Terrible Jungle
programme.desc: Eliott, a naive young researcher, heads off to study a mysterious tribe in Amazonia: the Otopis. An opportunity for him to escape his stiflingly possessive mother, Chantal de Bellabre! But worried about her son, she decides to go in search of him, deep in the jungle...

programme.title: Zzzen
programme.desc: The appearance of a mosquito disturbs the contemplative pilgrimage of a young monk and a chicken.

programme.title: L'attente
programme.desc: Jeanne and Celine are at the maternity clinic for the arrival of their first child. It's Jeanne who is going to give birth. During the night, in the hospital entrance hall, Celine meets two men who, like her... are waiting.

programme.title: Cerebrum - EP 9
programme.desc: Simone now has the crucial information she needs concerning Anne's personal life. But she'll need Henri's help to corroborate the new lead, and it's going to break his heart. Still obsessed by Marine, Jules gradually becomes closer to her. The teenager is in danger.

programme.title: Cerebrum - EP 10
programme.desc: Undermined by everything he's learnt and no closer to knowing who killed his wife, Henri is exhausted and has no-one to turn to. He thought he could rely on Simone, but she's no longer returning his calls. Tense and apprehensive, the family hope to finally discover the truth.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi - EP 27
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Tandem - Retour Vers Le Passe
programme.desc: Lea and Paul, head-over-heels in love, head off on holiday in Annie and Pierre's new house. Far from Montpellier and the police station, they intend making the most of this family time. Until the discovery of a human arm forces them to investigate. Where is the rest of the body?

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Quand Pearl Harbor Changea Le Destin De La France
programme.desc: 1941. The attack on Pearl Harbor gave General de Gaulle and his movement the legitimacy so lacking in the early days. It was in Oceania that France Libre became a territorial reality and that de Gaulle was recognised as its leader by the Americans.

programme.title: Quand L'homme N'est Pas La... Les Animaux Dansent ! - EP 2
programme.desc: How to protect wildlife from light pollution? During the lockdowns, switching off public lighting and the general slow-down in commercial and industrial activity reduced light levels in towns and cities. For egg-laying turtles, migrating birds and insect reproduction the consequences were immediate!

Little by little, bitterness and jealousy take hold, poisoning their relationship, until the irreparable happens.

programme.title: Femmes De L'art - EP 2
programme.desc: She said: ''A woman artist must be capable of making primary sacrifices.'' With Berthe Morisot, the American artist is one of the few women to have taken up Impressionism.

programme.title: Des Racines Et Des Ailes - EP 4
programme.desc: Exploring the city of Quebec, all the way to the Saguenay Fjords National Park, in deep mid-winter then in autumn as the forest dons its most vibrant colours. programme.title: Movie - Devarattam
programme.desc: Vetri, a young lawyer with anger issues, murders his friend in broad daylight who also happens to be the son of a local gangster. Later, the gangster wishes to kill Vetri.

programme.title: Movie - Maraivaasi
programme.desc: A billionaire's son returns after his father's death and joins the company as a regular employee in order to nab the people responsible for his father's murder.

programme.title: Movie - Vaikarai Pookkal

programme.title: Movie - Vanjagan

programme.title: Movie - Avatharam
programme.desc: Kuppusamy is crazy about acting in theatre. He joins a troupe and falls in love with Ponnama, a blind lady. However, the troupe struggles financially and is disbanded.

programme.title: Movie - En Bommukkutti Ammavukku
programme.desc: Vinod and Lakshmi, who lost their daughter in an accident, adopt Tinu, a vivacious young girl, from an orphanage. However, the family faces challenges when Tinu's birth parents set out to find her.

programme.title: Movie - Raja Kaiya Vecha
programme.desc: Raja pretends to be a cop in order to impress the woman he loves, and she dumps him on learning the truth. When they meet again, he has a good job, but there is someone else who is in love with him.

programme.title: Movie - Sandamarutham
programme.desc: Suriya, an undercover cop, must fight against the evil Sarveswaran, who plans to destroy the entire country with a chemical bomb, before it is too late.

programme.title: Movie - Allauddin

programme.title: Movie - Vavval Pasanga
programme.desc: A youngster is compelled to choose an unfavourable path because of societal pressure.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Amanda Lino vs. Manon Fiorot

programme.title: MEGA Fights Carlos Manuel Baldomir vs. Arturo Gatti
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features welterweights Carlos Manuel Baldomir, aka 'Tata' (42-9, 12 KOs) vs. Arturo 'Thunder' Gatti (40-7, 31 KOs) in a bout to unify the WBC and IBA titles. The fight took place at Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on July 22, 2006.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Luis Tavares vs Fatih Ulusoy
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Andre Berto vs. David Estrada
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a bout to determine a new NABF welterweight champion, as Andre Berto faces David Estrada. Also on the card, kickboxing legends Errol Zimmerman and Daniel Ghita battle to a gruesome end.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo

Show 4 featuring Nishikigi, Hokotofuji, Takakeisho and Ichinojo from the Kyushu basho, 2018.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: Highlights from the 26th Karate Senior World Championships as top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, all converged on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features a look at how John Alessio, a MMA veteran of almost 20 years, prepares for an upcoming fight. We head inside the kitchen of one of MMA's leading nutritionists, Mike Dolce, to find out what are the approved foods in the Dolce Diet. Melvin Guillard summons his inner daredevil and jumps off the Stratosphere in Las Vegas, plus much more.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Amanda Lino vs. Manon Fiorot
programme.desc: Check out exciting action from MMA organizations around the world. This episode features Amanda "MadDog" Lino vs. Manon Fiorot from EFC 83 in Pretoria, South Africa.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Carlos Manuel Baldomir vs. Arturo Gatti
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features welterweights Carlos Manuel Baldomir, aka 'Tata' (42-9, 12 KOs) vs. Arturo 'Thunder' Gatti (40-7, 31 KOs) in a bout to unify the WBC and IBA titles. The fight took place at Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on July 22, 2006.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Luis Tavares vs Fatih Ulusoy
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! From Abu Dhabi, UAE, this episode features two-division Enfusion champion Luis Tavares (the Netherlands) vs. Fatih 'The Ottoman' Ulusoy (Turkey).

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Andre Berto vs. David Estrada
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a bout to determine a new NABF welterweight champion, as Andre Berto faces David Estrada. Also on the card, kickboxing legends Errol Zimmerman and Daniel Ghita battle to a gruesome end.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. Show 4 featuring Nishikigi, Hokotofuji, Takakeisho and Ichinojo from the Kyushu basho, 2018.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Paul Williams I
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features middleweights Sergio 'Maravilla' Martinez (44-1, 24 KOs) vs. Paul 'The Punisher' Williams (37-1, 27 KOs) from Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on December 5, 2009. The result was a controversial majority decision, and the two would eventually square off in a rematch about a year later.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Lamont Peterson vs. Amir Khan
programme.desc: Lamont Peterson takes on Amir Khan in a bout with a controversial ending, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Tashkent Grand Prix, we speak with one of Israel's fighters Sagi Muki about the importance of positivity in the face of adversity, and we stop to get to know Dzmitry Minkou, a young talent in the world of Judo.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Amir Khan vs. Marcos Maidana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Amir Khan defending the WBA light welterweight title against Marcos Maidana in a bout that earned 2010 Fight of the Year honors from the Boxing Writers Association of America. Also on the card, a young Adrien Broner showcases his skills.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. Show 5 featuring Aoiyama, Endo, Takakeisho and Tamawashi from the Kyushu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 12: Kerala, India - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kalarippayattu and the Martial Art of Sword, Shield, Sticks, Open Hand and Kicks with Master Sureshan Nambiar.

programme.title: FS MMA Ante Delija vs. Oli Thompson
programme.desc: In this episode of FIGHT SPORTS MMA, we take you to action from KSW in Zagreb, Croatia, when local heavyweight Ante Delija from Dubrovnik takes on Oli "The Spartan" Thompson of East Sussex, England. The massive Delija, standing 6'5" and nearly 240 lbs (108 kg) holds a spectacular 16-3 record with tremendous power. Thompson is a veteran with 20 wins in his MMA career, and can stand toe-to-toe with Delija in his home country.

programme.title: WCCB Carlos Ocampo vs. Mikael Zewski
programme.desc: From the Colisee in Quebec, Canada, Mikael Zewski competes in front of his hometown fans against world-ranked veteran Carlos Ocampo of Mexico, with the WBC Continental Americas Super Welterweight Title on the line. Ocampo is a tough competitor, taking on the best in the world including Errol Spence Jr. for the IBF Welterweight World Championship. Zewski is also no stranger to the big stage, having held several North American and International WBA, IBF, and WBO titles himself.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this special one hour episode, we see the best of the World Judo Championships from Budapest where everyone in the world swarms to witness the crowning of 14 world champions. Also, world renowned fighter Teddy Riner experiences his hardest title defense in his career.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Juan Manuel Marquez vs. Marco Antonio Barrera
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a battle of multiple-weight world champions, as Juan Manuel Marquez challenges Marco Antonio Barrera for the WBC super featherweight title.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Kakuryu, Ikioi, Endo and Yutakayama from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Matthew Macklin
programme.desc: This episode features an undisputed middleweight title fight between Sergio Martinez and Matthew Macklin, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode is highlighted by a heartfelt interview with the legendary MMA Hall of Famer Tito Ortiz that shows you sides of the former champ you never knew from his childhood to his love of fishing to the man he is today. We stop by "Cowboy" Donald Cerrone's ranch to see you don't need the flashiest training equipment to be a world class fighter. Plus Nate Marquardt gets his dream car and UFC ring girls bring us on a tour of a new gym.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 91
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa‐Laa follow a trail of muddy footprints and find Po in bed with very muddy feet. The Noo-Noo cleans off the mud.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S2) - EP 10
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'bubble' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different bubbles - big bubbles, tiny bubbles, shiny bubbles and even bouncing bubbles!

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 26
programme.desc: Plom, Phoebe, Mae-Mae, Hooper, Zip, and Fly are a group of unique paper friends who live in Pop Paper City. They find new ways to have fun, such as playing pirates, building theme parks and even exploring outer space.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Someone pass Messy the tissues! He discovers that things just don't taste the same when he has a cold, especially his favourite chewy green socks - let's find out why.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 3
programme.desc: Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mum's word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why it's important not to break them.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 4
programme.desc: Bingo is helping Mum make an omelette for Dad's birthday breakfast, but cracking eggs is harder than it looks, and Dad is getting hungrier by the minute.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 33
programme.desc: Whilst helping Duggee clean up, the Squirrels come across an old lamp. Duggee explains that many years ago, when rubbed, it could grant three magical wishes.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 32
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn about atoms, molecules and cells to help understand sizing when they try to sort a line-up of things from smallest to biggest.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 31
programme.desc: The Squirrels are getting ready for the same woodland adventure, but their mornings all look slightly different.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 40
programme.desc: It's not a good day to be a glow-worm, when Grandmaster Glitch goes in search of some disco sparkles in New Zealand. Can the Go Jetters stop him?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 39
programme.desc: The team dives into action as Glitch's treasure hunt endangers the Great Barrier Reef.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 24
programme.desc: While Mum and Dad struggle to build new flat-pack furniture, Bluey and Bingo transform the empty boxes into their own new world.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 23
programme.desc: During a game of Queens, Bluey and Bingo find that playing the butler is much more fun. But someone must play the queen, even if it means not being afraid of a bit of hard work.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures (S1) - EP 21
programme.desc: Andy heads out on an Arctic adventure to find out where walrus mothers nurse their pups.

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest (S2) - EP 3
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers go on an eco quest to find out all about lavender.

programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 2

Later, when Noddy and all his friends are approaching Fable Forest Station on the train they discover someone has redirected the train tracks. They can't get to Fable Forest. How will they have the picnic in time? Noddy needs to investigate why the train tracks have been moved.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 42
programme.desc: Noddy returns from a Make and Take party at Pat-Pat's and finds the Builders are constructing a big orange palace in Toy Green. by order of the King of Toyland! Noddy decides to investigate: who is the mysterious King of Toyland? He spots the Knights carrying a royal litter, but all he can see inside is the top of an orange crown. Realising the King's favourite colour must be orange, Noddy remembers seeing Pat-Pat painting a bowl of oranges and wonders if she knows who the King is.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 41
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Parrot was the best keeper of secrets in the whole of Tinga Tinga. Infact Parrot couldn't open his beak at all! Then one day some beast dares to steal Lion's mane and Parrot sees the whole thing! But how is going to tell Lion?! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 42
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Bushbaby didn't have big eyes. She had tiny little eyes and she was always getting lost. Strange things begin to happen and there are stories that Majitu the Great Giant has returned to Tinga Tinga. Young Bushbaby doesn't believe a word of it... and convinces the other animals that Majitu the Giant does not exist. "If you can't see him, he's not real". But then she does see the Giant and her eyes grow big as planets. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 41

Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvin’s time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 70
programme.desc: An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits’ fun playtime. Meanwhile, the company makes its first purchase: upgraded communicators! R & D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, "Bridges Aflame." Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 71
programme.desc: Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, he’s applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Baby’s cover at stake, it’s up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S2 - EP 48
programme.desc: The crew teams up with grasshoppers in a fight against devious picnic ants; Turbo goes to great lengths to make somebody on the internet like him.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender S2 - EP 48
programme.desc: Allura and Lance walk in on Shiro, Pidge, Hunk, and Coran playing a magical role-playing board game

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: When a special guest is revealed as the villainous Goldentoe and hijacks the show, Peabody and Sherman must find a way to escape and regain control

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 69
programme.desc: Bumble's sneezing has got so bad, it is keeping everyone awake at night. Webby gives Fifi a recipe for a cure for sneezes… will it work?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 70
programme.desc: There is a horrid smell in Fifi's garden. Fifi goes to stay with Primrose and Violet while they try and work out where the smell is coming from. What could be causing it?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 43
programme.desc: Everyone is decorating special balloons in Toyland. They're going to have a big Balloon Release at the end of the day and see how far they can fly. But when Noddy returns in the afternoon with Big Ears, the balloons have already flown away! Noddy decides to investigate. Following all the clues, he arrives at Deltoid's house. The action hero toy tells him that he only took back his specially decorated balloon. The others were still there earlier.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 44
programme.desc: Noddy and his friends are building a toy tower. Carlton is joining in and having a great time. They've almost finished when one of the brick pieces goes missing! Oh no. How can they finish the tower without the last brick? Noddy needs to investigate. Using his detecting skills Noddy soon finds the missing brick.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 43
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Guinea Fowl didn't have dots. She was an adventurous bird and loved to discover things. One day Tortoise challenges her to find out why the top of Mount Tinga Tinga shines. Guinea Fowl can't resist and races off, over the desert, past the ocean, up to the very top of Mount Tinga Tinga where she does indeed discover why the top of Mount Tinga Tinga shines.... SNOW! Guinea Fowl is the first ever animal to see snow! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 44
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Buffalo didn't have horns. He had very long shaggy hair and he lived near the Swamp. But then one day the Swamp moves and Buffalo has to find a new home! The Swamp grows and grows and soon all the horned animals who live on the Plains risk losing their home too. So Buffalo decides to save the day and push back the muddy swamp. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 43
programme.desc: Big Chris has agreed to do a parachute jump for charity but loses his nerve on the big day. Can Roary talk him through it, just like Big Chris did for him when he got scared?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 44
programme.desc: The brass band booked for the Silver Hatch parade have cancelled. Mr Carburettor will be furious if he doesn't have music at his parade. Roary and his friends think up an ingenious plan...

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! S2 - EP 34
programme.desc: When Tag finds out that Pawston has a chance to host the Dogcathalon Race, she and Scooch rush around to create a movie to show why their city should host. Unfortunately everything seems to go wrong. Will Tag and Scooch be able to save their movie before time runs out? / When Tag's construction project accidentally damages Frank and Beans’ house, she invites them to stay with her family during repairs. Tag does her best to keep Frank and Beans busy so they don’t get in the Barkers’ way.

programme.title: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Oh takes it upon himself to introduce Christmas joy to his fellow Boovs. Unfortunately, his well-meaning mission nearly destroys the city.

programme.title: SPIRIT OF CHRISTMAS (RIDING FREE) S3 - EP 1
programme.desc: Lucky and friends must figure out how to get home in time for Christmas when a falling boulder -- and a serious snowstorm -- derail their travel plans.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus - EP 1
programme.desc: _x000D_ _x000D_When Boss Baby accidentally gets mistaken for an elf and sent to the North Pole on Christmas Eve, he mobilizes unpaid elf workers against an old nemesis: that charity-loving hippie people call Santa Claus. Meanwhile, Tim races to the North Pole to get his baby brother back home in time for Templeton Family Christmas traditions.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvin’s time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didn’t work quite how they’d hoped.

programme.title: Puss in Boots: The Three Diablos S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: After Puss in Boots is captured by soldiers he is enlisted to re-steal the priceless "Heart of Fire Ruby" a ruby stolen by the notorious, wicked and impossible-to-hear villain, known as The Whisperer. Puss must partner with the villain's henchmen, The Three Little Kittens, to seize the ruby. Babysitting has never been more dangerous. Will our hero Puss in Boots tame the Three Diablos in time to recover the ruby?

programme.title: Far Far Away Idol S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Watch your favorite Shrek characters sing the night away in this hilarious spoof. Join in the fun as Fiona, Puss in Boots, Donkey and the rest of the Far Far Away Kingdom battle it out in a singer's showdown.

programme.title: Scared Shrekless S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Shrek gets in the Halloween spirit by challenging his fairytale friends to come up with scary stories for a contest. But the gang learn that they'll have to spend the night in Lord Farquaad's haunted castle before the winner is named.

programme.title: Madly Madagascar S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Romance is in the air for Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman after King Julien discovers a magical perfume and takes on the role as "King of Love."

programme.title: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: The Three Pigs live in a house together, but Heimlich gets scared when he sees Wolf move in next door and acting strange.

programme.title: The Ghost of Lord Farquaad S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Shrek, Fiona, and Donkey are on their way to the hotel where Shrek and Fiona will spend their honeymoon when they encounter Lord Farquaad's ghost!

programme.title: Megamind: The Button of Doom S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: After one "button" unleashes the gigantic robot MEGA-MEGAmind on Metro City, MegaMind and Minion must rely on their old tricks to restore order.

programme.title: Monsters vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins from Outer Space S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Susan Murphy (a.k.a. Ginormica) and the Monsters are now working with the US government as special ops. So when an alien presence is detected in Susan's hometown of Modesto, California -- right before Halloween -- the team is dispatched to investigate. Everything appears normal, right down to the jack-o-lanterns peering out from every doorstep and windowsill. But when Halloween arrives, those innocent-looking carved pumpkins reveal themselves for what they really are mutant aliens.

programme.title: Us Money Movers
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Us Money Movers

"Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Tyler Mathisen and Kelly Evans take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Tyler Mathisen and Kelly Evans take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime

programme.title: Asia Squawk Box
programme.desc: Anchored by Martin Soong and Sri Jegarajah at the Singapore Exchange (SGX), "Squawk Box" is CNBC’s flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and opening of Asia's business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers.

programme.title: Asia Street Signs
programme.desc: Anchored by Tanvir Gill at the Singapore Exchange (SGX), "Street Signs" follows the day's biggest moves to provide CNBC's audience with actionable, real-time insights. From the anchor desk to trading desks around the region, "Street Signs" helps viewers capitalize on the plays of the day.

programme.title: Us Fast Money (recorded) 2024
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Capital Connection
programme.desc: Hosted by Dan Murphy at NASDAQ Dubai, "Capital Connection" gives you a reading on Asia's markets mid-day and sets you up for the Middle East and European trading day.

programme.title: Europe Squawk Box
programme.desc: Anchored by Steve Sedgwick, Karen Tso and Arabile Gumede, CNBC’s flagship show leads you into and delivers the open of the European markets. Featuring leading business executives, financial strategists and fund managers, "Squawk Box" provides original points of view and instant analysis of the latest business and market news.

programme.title: Europe Street Signs
programme.desc: One hour into Europe’s equity session, "Street Signs" provides the street's view and a link to business stories trending online and on social. Bridging the European and U.S. trading days across asset classes, it breaks key economic data in Europe and provides live price action in the biggest moving stocks, bonds, currencies and commodities.

programme.title: Us Worldwide Exchange
programme.desc: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBC’s "Worldwide Exchange" delivers essential, actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation. Anchored by Frank Holland, the program prepares CNBC’s worldwide audience with a smart take on overnight U.S. news and live international market action.

programme.title: Us Squawk Box
programme.desc: "Squawk Box" is the ultimate pre-market morning news and talk program, where the biggest names in business and politics tell their most important stories. Anchored by Joe Kernen, Becky Quick and Andrew Ross Sorkin, the show brings Wall Street to Main Street. It's a must-see for everyone from the professional trader to the casual investor.

programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, "Squawk On The Street" tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. The show also covers the final hour of European trading, providing investors with actionable insight on the best course of action to take in U.S. based markets.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: The World From Above
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.title: Ruang Makna
programme.desc: A program that discusses the meaning of words that are often heard and used every day in the context of life. Presented concisely and easy to understand.

programme.title: Sea Morning Show (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Morning Show delivers up to-date news, live reports, talk shows and features about Indonesia and also Southeast Asia which airs daily 6 - 9 am.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S1
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: Tough Boats
programme.desc: A brand new series that explores some of the most fascinating and hard-core boat journeys on the planet. In this mini series we undertake epic journeys by boats in some of the toughest environments on earth. During our journeys we look at how the technology of boat travel has been adapted to survive, trade with and connect isolated communities.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Travel Quest is an eco travel adventure series showcasing some of the most exciting, exotic and often dangerous places in earth Host Bill Ball, a true " challenges himself in each episode as he attempts to check an adventure, thrill or rare animal off his personal bucket list Tracking jaguars, diving with sharks, climbing cliffs in Africa, photographing gorillas, bicycling across the Serengeti and finding cannibals on remote and forbidden islands are all part of his Travel Quest

programme.title: Epic Trails
programme.desc: Epic Trails is a visually stunning and inspiring television series that follows wilderness adventurer, Eric Hanson, on his journey to discover the world's most amazing trails Each 30 minute episode follows Eric on one of his world travels taking viewers on breathtaking adventures while sharing unique stories of the places and the people Eric encounters along the way

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: 3-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 3 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 4 - 7 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: World Of Durian
programme.desc: A program that will review all types of durian typical of the archipelago, starting from the history, taste and specialty of each durian.

programme.title: Stories Of Taste
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: A culinary program that finds out what makes celebrities crave fancy food like prata, grilled meat, sushi, satay, ice cream and even a big English breakfast.

programme.title: Apose S1
programme.desc: APOSE: ANAK PODCAST SEJATI tells the story of a podcaster's work life both on air and behind the scenes. In this series, there is a star podcaster who will interview a number of sources who will be present at the office.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: Rediscovering China
programme.desc: Rediscovering China is a half-hour documentary program on CGTN. Each edition offers unique insight into various aspects of life in China today. With unrivalled access to the country's people and places, the program aims to show the global audience an inclusive and vigorous China._x000D__x000D_

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: The Heat is a daily talk show anchored from Washington, D.C. It focuses on top stories making news globally. programme.title: Drama Serial "Carnation" Encore Eps. 67
programme.desc: A heroine born into a kimono store family in Kishiwada, Osaka, holds admiration for clothing and discovers a sewing machine. Despite her father’s opposition, she is undeterred and pursues her passion for dressmaking. She opens a store at age 20 and gets married, but her husband dies in the war. The story depicts the life of a powerful woman who becomes a pioneer of Japan’s fashion design while overcoming many obstacles.

programme.desc: #28 May I take photos here? / When seeking permission to do something, change the end of a verb to "te" style. For example, "toru" (take) becomes "totte." Then add "mo ii desu ka."

programme.title: News Treasury 2024
programme.desc: News Treasury 2024 takes everyone to uncover news from the treasure house. In addition to past specials, live broadcasts and reports, there are also precious clips from iconic events that have never been exposed.

programme.title: The Last Steep Ascent - EP 14
programme.desc: In his youth, Miu Tin encountered bride-to-be Koo Sun-Yuet, who has lingered in his mind ever since. Twenty years later, the two meet again.

programme.title: Call Of Destiny - EP 11
programme.desc: Fang Ri Jin unexpectedly connects with Xing Ke Lan, who is in a future timeline and trapped in a crisis. Is fate already predetermined? Will Ri Jin choose to compromise, or will he take a leap of faith to rewrite the destiny?

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2443
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Scoop 2024
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Ring Ling Ling
programme.desc: Mak Ling Ling is a Feng Shui master and an actor. She has been involved in different fields such as business, acting and fortune telling. Stay tuned and listen to the unique insights of Ling Ling and various guests on the show!

programme.title: The Legend of Xiao Chuo - EP 36

programme.desc: Three Man brothers each opened their own noodle store to compete with each other. Mother Wan (Nancy Sit) has no choice but to help them settle the dispute by using their family treasure to get the brothers to compete with the eventual goal of uniting them.

programme.title: Word Twisters' Adventures - EP 6
programme.desc: The most difficult thing for an articulate legal expert is not to win a lawsuit but to bargain for a twist of fate. Plagued by a mysterious family curse, CHAN MUNG-KAT (Chan Siu Chun), who comes from a legal family, is forced to fool around and devotes all his time to running a brothel despite his great talent.

programme.title: As Sure as Fate - EP 6
programme.desc: Due to business failure, De (Yuan Siu-hsiang) and his wife Mei (Kwok Siu-yun) returned to Hong Kong from Canada to seek further development due to business failure. rapport. However, De's father (Guo Feng) felt that the space at home was cramped, so he decided to sell his old residence and loaned the deposit received at high interest to his daughter Fei (Teng Liming)'s boyfriend Jian (Xie Tianhua).

programme.title: Ringmaster, The - EP 6
programme.desc: Muay Thai champion Hoi Ching-hei (Shuan Tam) manages to hold his ground in his farewell match. However, after a celebration gathering, he soon abruptly meets his death as he quarrels with someone while saving some drunk woman. Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-hei’s boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.

programme.title: Last Breakthrough, The - EP 22
programme.desc: Dr. WONG PO FUN (CHEUNG KA FAI, NICK) joins "Life Force", an international medical humanitarian organization, to carry out the unfulfilled wish of his deceased girlfriend, TUNG (LEUNG WING KEI, GIGI). He also sets up "Lung Shing Medical Centre" to help the poor. _x000D__x000D_ When FUN is working with the organization in Kenya, he meets a young doctor called CHAI PAK HANG (LAM, RAYMOND), who works at a private hospital named "Ling Siu" in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Vigilante Force - EP 15
programme.desc: Serious Crime sergeant, AH (LAM, BOWIE), grew up in a village in the New Territories. He is well respected by his colleagues. He works hard hoping to earn a promotion. One day, the headquarters appoints a superior, YIN (MA TAK CHUNG, JOE), to his division, killing all his hope. AH gets along with his colleagues. YIN is straight with his subordinates. Who will gain more co-operation from their colleagues? _x000D__x000D_ AH devotes himself to work.

programme.desc: Serious Crime sergeant, AH (LAM, BOWIE), grew up in a village in the New Territories. He is well respected by his colleagues. He works hard hoping to earn a promotion.
